text:
An old silent pond . . .
A frog jumps into the pond,
splash! Silence again.

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
have you heard this one?

snow is still falling,
is it time for apres yet?
let's do one more run

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat

Gliding through white peaks,
Whispers of snowflakes dancingâ€”
Winter's swift embrace.
